segments.text: Would you mind taking your feet off the table , Mike ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . But I've found satisfaction in it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you put your feet on your own table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want to mark my table , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , will you please put them down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I thought you wouldn't come back so early .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I forgot something on the table .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you've got a good memory .
segments.speaker: S2
